div.head: 夜臥驚汗
div.div: fright and sweating during sleep at night

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: fright and sweating during sleep at night

sense.def: Illness Sign of suddenly waking up in fright from sleep at night and sweating without apparent reason . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：龍骨止夜臥驚汗 , “ Long gu stops fright and sweating during one’s sleep at night ”.
